item.description: The name of the food item

servesize.description: The serving size of the food item in grams

calories.description: The amount of calories in the food item

protien.description: The amount of protein in the food item in grams

totalfat.description: The total amount of fat in the food item in grams

satfat.description: The amount of saturated fat in the food item in grams

transfat.description: The amount of trans fat in the food item in grams

cholestrol.description: The amount of cholesterol in the food item in milligrams

carbs.description: The amount of carbohydrates in the food item in grams

sugar.description: The amount of sugar in the food item in grams

addedsugar.description: The amount of added sugar in the food item in grams

sodium.description: The amount of sodium in the food item in milligrams

menu.description: The menu category of the food item

value_dict.regular: Items that are available in the regular menu of McDonalds
value_dict.breakfast: Items that are available in the breakfast menu of McDonalds
value_dict.mccafe: Items that are available in the McCafe menu of McDonalds
value_dict.dessert: Items that are available in the dessert menu of McDonalds
value_dict.gourmet: Items that are available in the gourmet menu of McDonalds
value_dict.beverage: Items that are available in the beverage menu of McDonalds
value_dict.condiments: Items that are available in the condiments menu of McDonalds
